description: This file defines a UI component named 'NotesList' using the LightningJS framework. It manages displaying a list of notes, handling user interactions such as adding, selecting, and deleting notes, and subscribes to note updates via external services.

classes.name: NotesList
classes.description: A LightningJS component that renders and manages a list of notes, allowing users to add, select, and delete notes with reactive updates.

methods.name: $itemTitle
methods.description: Returns the title of a note item or 'Untitled' if not available.

methods.name: $itemUpdated
methods.description: Returns a localized string of the note's last updated timestamp.

methods.name: $rowColor
methods.description: Determines the background color of a note row based on whether it is selected.

methods.name: $itemY
methods.description: Calculates the y-position for a note item based on its index and current scroll position.

methods.name: $trashColor
methods.description: Returns the color for the trash icon background based on hover state.

methods.name: $onTrashHover
methods.description: Handles mouse enter event over trash icon, setting hover index.

methods.name: $onTrashLeave
methods.description: Resets hover index when mouse leaves trash icon.

methods.name: $onAddHover
methods.description: Handles mouse enter event over add button, changing its color.

methods.name: $onAddLeave
methods.description: Handles mouse leave event over add button, reverting color.

methods.name: $emitSelect
methods.description: Updates selected note ID and calls external callback if provided.

methods.name: $select
methods.description: Triggers selection of a note by ID.

methods.name: $handleNew
methods.description: Creates a new note and selects it.

methods.name: $remove
methods.description: Deletes a note with confirmation behavior and updates selection accordingly.
